# Overview

This web page contains all data regarding the COTAN paper. Here can be found

- All datasets analysis 
- The analysis done on the E16.5 mouse hippocampal dataset done using WGCNA
- The comparition of our gene clustering and the gene markers found with the markers found in Loo et al. paper. This part also contain the comparition with the WGCNA approach.
- The negative dataset analysis.
